snippet: Prosecutors said Shannon Guess Richardson, 35, mailed ricin-laced letters to President Obama and former Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York.
abstract: Actress Shannon Guess Richardson is sentenced in Texas to 18 years in federal prison for mailing ricin-laced letters to President Obama and former New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Shannon Guess Richardson, 35, mailed ricin-laced letters to President Obama and former Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg of New York.

headline.main: Texas: Actress Gets 18-Year Sentence in Ricin Case
